summary: A suite of unit tests that validate the SystemTrustDatabaseAdmin UI component, checking widget creation, button state management, event emission for added files, loading of trust data, handling of load errors, status markup generation, and updating of trust details using mocked dependencies and reactive streams.
business_intent: Guarantee that the system trust management interface in the policy analyzer functions correctly, providing reliable user feedback, proper handling of trust files, and robust error reporting to maintain system security and user confidence.
